AttractSection.title: Your Journey Starts Here
AttractSection.subtitle: Contact Monacair for an end-to-end premium service: from booking your helicopter or private jet to your arrival at your destination, we take care of every detail to offer you an unforgettable flight experience

private.title: Private Flights
private.description: Enjoy an exclusive and customized service with our private flights. Monacair offers a luxurious, fast, and comfortable travel experience, tailored to your needs. Reach your destination with peace of mind, with a premium service and total flexibility.

pano.title: Panoramic Flights
pano.description: Treat yourself to an unforgettable experience flying over the breathtaking landscapes of the French Riviera and Monaco. Our panoramic flights allow you to admire stunning views from the sky, in the comfort and elegance of our helicopters. A unique moment to experience or offer as a gift!

regular.title: Regular Lines
regular.description: Travel quickly and comfortably with our regular lines. Monacair guarantees frequent, punctual, and elegant connections, particularly between Monaco and Nice airport in just 7 minutes. Enjoy a premium service for a stress-free journey and a peaceful arrival.

jet.title: Private Jet
jet.description: Travel without limits with our customized private jet service. Monacair offers an exclusive experience, combining luxury, comfort, and total flexibility. Take off at the time of your choice and reach any destination in the world with unparalleled discretion and efficiency.

sport.title: Sport
sport.subtitle: Join the biggest events with an express private flight

gastronomie.title: Gastronomy
gastronomie.subtitle: Land at the doorstep of the most prestigious restaurants

culture.title: Culture
culture.subtitle: Travel to the heart of the most beautiful cultural destinations by helicopter

AttractSection.title: Your Journey Starts Here
AttractSection.subtitle: Contact Monacair for an end-to-end premium service: from booking your helicopter or private jet to your arrival at your destination, we take care of every detail to offer you an unforgettable flight experience

our-history.foundation: Monacair was founded in 1988 by Stefano Casiraghi.
our-history.services-intro: Monacair offers a wide range of services in the helicopter field:

services-list.management: Helicopter management, including consulting, housing, pilots, refueling, and maintenance.
services-list.charter: Private charter flights to all destinations.

our-history.official-provider: Since 1999, the company has been the Official Provider of H.S.H. the Sovereign Prince of Monaco, Albert II.
our-history.regular-service: On January 1, 2016, the Princely Government of Monaco designated Monacair as the sole operator of the regular transfer service between Nice Côte d'Azur Airport and Monaco.

monacair-leader.title: Monacair, the leading helicopter airline in France
monacair-leader.operational-bases: Monacair has several operational bases that allow it to offer exceptional services to its passengers: Monaco - Cannes, in Annecy to serve the French and Swiss Alps, and Grimaud, in the immediate vicinity of Saint-Tropez, for private and regular flights dedicated to tourists and business travelers to all destinations on the French Riviera, Provence, Corsica, and Italy.
monacair-leader.team-goal: The entire MONACAIR team has one goal: to deliver high-quality service, regardless of the moment of travel.
monacair-leader.services: The MONACAIR Group has deployed a range of services to facilitate the daily lives of its clients, from simple transfers between two destinations to introductions to piloting.
monacair-leader.maintenance: This quality of service is made possible by the reliability of the helicopters, whose upkeep and maintenance are managed internally in the workshops of its subsidiary Rotor Team.
monacair-leader.modern-fleet: By operating the latest generation aircraft with comfort and materials that rival the most modern ones, MONACAIR has been able to build loyalty among a demanding clientele.
monacair-leader.trust: A luxury level service, exceptional responsiveness, and highly secure flights have allowed Monacair and its subsidiaries Heli Sécurité and Rotor Team to win and maintain the trust of its clients. This trust and loyalty are the keys to the sustainability of Héli Sécurité.

our-services.title: Our Services
our-services.regular-line: Since January 2016, Monacair is the official and sole Monegasque operator of the Regular Line between Monaco and Nice Côte d'Azur International Airport.
our-services.daily-flights: The company operates more than 40 daily flights, scheduled every 15 minutes. Based at Monaco heliport and at all terminals of Nice Côte d'Azur Airport.

services-list.passenger: Passenger handling, including boarding/disembarking and baggage handling.
services-list.crew: Handling of crews of non-based private helicopters.

our-services.fleet: In September 2015, shortly after Monacair won the tender from the Princely Government of Monaco, an order was placed for six brand new H130 single-engine helicopters with enlarged trunks. Delivery was received between December 2015 and the end of April 2016. These helicopters are air-conditioned and are mainly used for regular line transfers: Monaco-Nice and Nice-Monaco.

alliance.title: MONACAIR ALLIANCE
alliance.subtitle: 3 Renowned Companies for a unique service.

description.intro: The Heli Securite Blade Monacair alliance offers you a tailor-made flight experience, combining flexibility, comfort, and safety.
description.destinations: Take off aboard one of our high-performance and latest generation helicopters for a transfer to or from all French, Corsican, Italian, Swiss airports, but also to all your winter destinations.
description.alps: Direction The Alps and its snowy peaks. Put on your skis and enjoy the most beautiful ski slopes in the world, enjoy outdoor activities, discover the rich culture & gastronomy of the Alps.

page.title: Our Fleet
page.subtitle: Discover our fleet of modern, comfortable, and safe helicopters for all your travels.

intro.title: Excellence and Safety
intro.description: Monacair has a modern fleet of helicopters, regularly maintained and updated to ensure your safety and comfort. Our aircraft are piloted by experienced professionals and meet the strictest safety standards.

safety.title: Maximum Safety
safety.description: All our aircraft undergo rigorous and regular inspections to ensure optimal safety.

comfort.title: Premium Comfort
comfort.description: Our helicopters are equipped to offer you a comfortable and pleasant flight experience.

technology.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
technology.description: Our fleet incorporates the latest technological advances for safer and quieter flights.

helicopter.description: A modern and high-performance helicopter offering exceptional comfort and reliability. Ideal for all your travel needs with top-tier safety features and comfort.

h130.title: Airbus H130
h130.description: The Airbus H130 (formerly Eurocopter EC130) is a light single-engine helicopter that offers exceptional comfort and a panoramic view for all passengers. Ideal for transfers and panoramic flights, it combines performance, safety, and elegance.

h125.title: Airbus H125
h125.description: The Airbus H125 (formerly Eurocopter AS350) is known for its versatility and exceptional performance. This light single-engine helicopter offers great reliability and adapts perfectly to all types of missions, from VIP transfers to panoramic flights.

h145.title: Airbus H145
h145.description: The Airbus H145 represents the pinnacle of luxury and technology. This twin-engine helicopter offers a generous cabin space and exceptional comfort. Ideal for VIP flights and long-distance transfers, it guarantees a quiet and refined flight experience.

page.subtitle: Discover Monaco and the French Riviera through exclusive and unforgettable experiences

first.title: Starred Dinner in Monaco
first.description: Experience an exceptional culinary experience in one of Monaco's most prestigious starred restaurants. After a panoramic helicopter flight, you will be welcomed for a gourmet dinner prepared by a world-renowned chef.

second.title: Cooking Class with a Starred Chef
second.description: Learn the secrets of Mediterranean cuisine during a private class with a starred chef. You will discover professional techniques and prepare a gourmet meal that you will then taste.
second.imageAlt: Cooking class with a starred chef

third.title: Wine Tasting in Provence
third.description: Embark on a discovery of Provence vineyards by helicopter. You will visit prestigious estates and participate in exclusive tastings guided by expert sommeliers.

Reservation.contactInfo: For more information or to make a personalized reservation, contact us by phone at +377 97 97 39 00 or by email at booking@monacair.mc.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Discover testimonials from our clients who have experienced our gastronomic experiences

items.quote: An unforgettable gastronomic experience! The starred dinner in Monaco was exceptional, and the helicopter flight added a magical touch to the evening.
items.name: Sophie L.

items.quote: The cooking class with the starred chef was fantastic. I learned techniques that I now use at home. An enriching and delicious experience!
items.name: Jean-Pierre M.

items.quote: The wine tasting in Provence was an exceptional experience. Flying over the vineyards by helicopter and then tasting exceptional wines was perfect!
items.name: Amélie D.

provence.description: Discover the most beautiful museums and art galleries in Provence, followed by a tasting at a renowned wine estate. Helicopter transport to enjoy the landscapes.

travelWith.title: Travel With Monacair: A High-End Service
travelWith.description: Book your private jet with Monacair and discover the luxury of tailor-made air transport. Whether for a prestigious event or a private trip, we offer you an exclusive and personalized service.

about.title: About Monacair
about.description: Monacair is the leader in private helicopter and jet services on the French Riviera. We are committed to offering our clients luxury transport experiences, with particular attention to safety, discretion, and comfort. Thanks to a modern fleet and impeccable service, each flight becomes an unforgettable moment.

travelWith.cta_text: Book your private flight today and experience an exceptional journey with Monacair.

hero.title: MONACAIR Management Service
hero.subtitle: The management service offered by MONACAIR has been designed to provide you with total expertise, to save you time, money, and spare you hassles.
hero.description: With this service, you enjoy an optimal and enriching experience with your helicopter, maintained according to the strictest standards. MONACAIR takes care of all administrative and operational aspects related to owning a helicopter, allowing you to fully enjoy your property with complete freedom and flexibility.
hero.trustDescription: Thanks to its neutral management, rigorous financial control, and scrupulous adherence to aircraft safety and maintenance standards, MONACAIR ensures you total peace of mind.

costControl.title: Cost control
costControl.description: MONACAIR ensures 100% financial transparency. Its operation is based on expense rebilling – you receive a copy of each invoice for expenses related to your helicopter, with customized reports according to your needs.
benefits: Tailor-made, priority service at the best rate
Access to exceptional insurance conditions thanks to its leading fleet in Europe

helicopterSales.title: Helicopter Purchases / Sales
helicopterSales.buyDescription: If you are planning to purchase a helicopter, MONACAIR accompanies you at every step of your process and helps you choose the aircraft perfectly suited to your needs. Our 30+ years of experience and market expertise allow us to optimize your purchase process, taking care of market research, selection of offers, and negotiation to guarantee you a helicopter equipped with all the essential options.
helicopterSales.inspectionDescription: As part of our service, we carry out preliminary checks and inspections for helicopters of brands such as Airbus Helicopter, Bell, Robinson, Guimbal... to ensure the quality of each aircraft. We negotiate the best purchase conditions for you and offer you meticulous follow-up, guaranteeing a helicopter that meets your expectations.
helicopterSales.sellDescription: Finally, our trading activity includes the sale of aircraft. If you are considering selling your helicopter, don't hesitate to contact us to benefit from our complete support and our expertise in order to make a sale under the best conditions.

crewManagement.title: Crew management
crewManagement.description: We offer a complete after-sales service, recruiting a dedicated crew, trained and certified in our academy. We can also help you save recruitment costs by offering our crews for your disposal.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: We also ensure the maintenance of your aircraft in our hangars, to guarantee that it is always ready to take off safely and reliably.
maintenance.certificationDescription: MONACAIR offers a helicopter maintenance service within our subsidiary, Rotor Team, certified EASA 145 (No. FR.145.0517).
maintenance.locationsDescription: Our facilities and workshops located in Grimaud, Saint-Tropez, and Cannes, as well as in Annecy and Courchevel, offer you the flexibility you can expect.

charter.title: Charter / Chartering
charter.description: If you wish to make your investment profitable, we also offer you the possibility of managing the marketing of your helicopter. We operate private flights all year round in the South of France and the Alps, thus allowing you to benefit from our client portfolio of the Monacair Blade Heli Sécurité Alliance.

ctaSection.title: Interested in Our Management Service?
ctaSection.description: Contact our team to discover how our management services can save you time and money.
